rev.comment: I deleted the little messages people left, sorry...Whoever it was please don't do it again.
The "Sorbonne" was called the University of Paris. The Sorbonne is just the University's most famous building.

Revert 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/63.162.227.99|63.162.227.99]] ([[User talk:63.162.227.99|talk]]) to last revision by [[Special:Contributions/Etacar11|Etacar11]] using [[User:Gracenotes/amelvand.js|amelvand]]
Revert to latest by Etacar11 remove vandalism
/* Life */ "Between" refers to two things; "among," to more than two.
/* Life */ lose embellishment (the story is good enough without it) and slightly more encyclopedic lang
/* Life */ no ironic twists of fate please. let the reader decide. just present the facts
/* Life */ It was Eve Curie who attended the College Sevigne.
/* Life */ restore fact tag. please supply a verifiable reference for someone having remarked in this way, or else it is OR
